name: bug.OS
description:
bug.OS is a quick game made for the GameOff 2021 GameJam with the theme "Bug".

Your task is to discard all the files on the desktop.
Press [Esc] to close the game.

There are some issues with the sensitivity of the cursor, depending on the input device. Adjust the sensitivity with up/down arrow. (Making it too fast will ruin the challenge tho...)

Source Code: https://github.com/okkdev/bug.OS

Game design and art: Suissujin - itch.io
Development: me :)
